useCase.name: Manage Court Details
useCase.description: Allow the user to manage court details

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has access to account details

failureEndConditions.condition: Error occurs while updating court details

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the Court Details link

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the Court Details link
User navigates to Court Details page
Local Justice Areas records are retrieved from the Fines Database
Local Justice Areas are displayed on the page
Courts records are retrieved from the Fines Database
Courts are displayed on the page
User enters Court details and returns to account details
User navigates back to account details
